title: Object Store vs Vector Store (Template Technical Note)
summary: Explains the division of responsibilities between an Object Store and a Vector Store in an IT pipeline.
body: Object Store: authoritative source of truth for canonical artifacts (JSON, PDFs, images) with content hashes.
Vector Store: derived index over chunks/embeddings for semantic retrieval; must reference object IDs and hashes.
Policy gates apply both at ingestion and at retrieval time.
V&V checks confirm schema compliance, provenance completeness, and hash integrity.
